message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be a valuable asset to your business. I'm offering it to you for $900000. This price reflects the significant value I see in this product, and I believe it represents a strong investment opportunity for you.  I understand you may need time to consider, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. If you're not interested, I've already secured another buyer at $800000. Let me know your thoughts.
